title: Is Singapore’s USD 110 million space-tech investment an opportunity for Indian firms? - ThePrint
content: Is Singapore’s USD 110 million space-tech investment an opportunity for Indian firms?  ThePrint
description: Singapore, February 14 (ANI): Last week at the 14th Global Space and Technology Convention 2022 held in Singapore, the Singapore government announced that it is committing SGD 150 million (USD 110 million) to the space technology industry through research and development (R&D) funding.The programme will be hemmed by the Office for Space Technology and Industry […]
